item.title: 3.2. Data Access under Spatial or Temporal Conditions
item.description: Table Of Contents Data access under temporal conditions Data access under spatial conditions Case study: Is the air quality here worse than there? Import data Remove invalid data Calculate distance Pandas package Results References This article will access the data of the Civil IoT Taiwan project from the perspective of time and space, and carry out a simple implementation with the theme of air quality monitoring. It will covers the following topics:
